name: zaisnovel
description: 書籍管理系統 - 全端應用

scripts.start: cd ExpressByMySQL && npm install && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config ./config/config.js --migrations-path ./migrations && node app.js
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd ExpressByMySQL && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
